title: Cannot accept EULA
body:
After patching I click the launch button, which sometimes doesn't do anything but sometimes the EULA agreement will come up and after being clicked once will go away and nothing will happen. (normally the EULA agreement will come up twice and then the game will launch)


I've tried reinstalling multiple times, running as admin, forcing a re-patch, using the repair tool, disabling my firewall, (also made sure league was an exception just in case) syncing my windows clock and configuring my dns. I've done pretty much everything I could and I still can't do anything after pressing the launch button.

replies.body: I appreciate the troubleshooting done so far, but this may not necessarily be an issue with game files.  It sounds like your network is having trouble establishing a connection to the authentication servers, so it can't communicate that the EULA has been accepted.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to strengthen your connection and get through.  Regarding your firewall, you can use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which will automatically configure your firewall!  Let me know if that doesn't help!
